questions.text: Explain the purpose of RAM in a computer system.
Write a Python program that prints 'Hello, World!' to the screen.
Describe the difference between volatile and non-volatile memory.
Convert the binary number 1101 to decimal.
Explain what a syntax error is in programming.
Write a Python function called 'add' that takes two numbers and returns their sum.
Explain the purpose of the operating system.
List two input devices and two output devices.
